name: Land, Inputs and Sustainability: Fertilizers by Product - FAO (2021)
description: The Fertilizers by Product dataset contains information on the Production, Trade and Agriculture Use of inorganic (chemical or mineral) fertilizers products, over the time series 2002-present. The fertilizer statistics data are for a set of 23 product categories. Both straight and compound fertilizers are included. There is information available about methodology at: http://fenixservices.fao.org/faostat/static/documents/RFB/RFB_EN_README.pdf.
source_name: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
